Questionnaire Template Name: Higher Education Community Vendor Assessment Tool (HECVAT) - BCP (v2.11)
Question: BCPL-01: Describe or provide a reference to your Business Continuity Plan (BCP).

Questionnaire Template Name: Higher Education Community Vendor Assessment Tool (HECVAT) - BCP (v2.11)
Question: BCPL-02: May the Institution review your BCP and supporting documentation?

Questionnaire Template Name: Higher Education Community Vendor Assessment Tool (HECVAT) - BCP (v2.11)
Question: BCPL-03: Is an owner assigned who is responsible for the maintenance and review of the Business Continuity Plan?

Questionnaire Template Name: Higher Education Community Vendor Assessment Tool (HECVAT) - BCP (v2.11)
Question: BCPL-04: Is there a defined problem/issue escalation plan in your BCP for impacted clients?

Questionnaire Template Name: Higher Education Community Vendor Assessment Tool (HECVAT) - BCP (v2.11)
Question: BCPL-05: Is there a documented communication plan in your BCP for impacted clients?

Questionnaire Template Name: Higher Education Community Vendor Assessment Tool (HECVAT) - BCP (v2.11)
Question: BCPL-06: Are all components of the BCP reviewed at least annually and updated as needed to reflect change?

Questionnaire Template Name: Higher Education Community Vendor Assessment Tool (HECVAT) - BCP (v2.11)
Question: BCPL-07: Has your BCP been tested in the last year?

Questionnaire Template Name: Higher Education Community Vendor Assessment Tool (HECVAT) - BCP (v2.11)
Question: BCPL-08: Does your organization conduct training and awareness activities to validate its employees understanding of their roles and responsibilities during a crisis?

Questionnaire Template Name: Higher Education Community Vendor Assessment Tool (HECVAT) - BCP (v2.11)
Question: BCPL-09: Are specific crisis management roles and responsibilities defined and documented?

Questionnaire Template Name: Higher Education Community Vendor Assessment Tool (HECVAT) - BCP (v2.11)
Question: BCPL-10: Does your organization have an alternative business site or a contracted Business Recovery provider?

Questionnaire Template Name: Higher Education Community Vendor Assessment Tool (HECVAT) - BCP (v2.11)
Question: BCPL-11: Does your organization conduct an annual test of relocating to an alternate site for business recovery purposes?

Questionnaire Template Name: Higher Education Community Vendor Assessment Tool (HECVAT) - BCP (v2.11)
Question: BCPL-12: Is this product a core service of your organization, and as such, the top priority during business continuity planning?
